display_long_description:
Immerse yourself in a comprehensive OSHA 1910.157 fire extinguisher training course, designed to fulfill your annual portable fire extinguisher training requirements. This VR simulation provides a hands-on, interactive experience covering all five types of fire extinguishers: A, B, C, D, and K.

## **Key Features**

- In-depth coverage of fire extinguisher types and their applications
- Practical training on pull stations and the PASS technique (Pull, Aim, Squeeze, and Sweep)
- Exploration of fire extinguisher components
- Comprehensive overview of fire classifications and their characteristics
- Engaging randomized fight-or-flight scenarios for real-world preparedness

This application is part of an educational platform, and access is granted through seat purchase and assignment managed by your institution's administrator via the EXR Manager Dashboard (https://xrmanager.elitexr.com/).

Not sure if FEVR Fire Extinguisher Training is right for you? Experience our Demo within the app to get a taste of the immersive learning environment.

Enhance your fire safety knowledge and skills in a secure, immersive environment. Be prepared, confident, and compliant with OSHA regulations through this state-of-the-art VR training experience.
